name: 눈 떠보니 임진왜란이었다 - Back To the Joseon
name_original: 눈 떠보니 임진왜란이었다 - Back To the Joseon
description:
"After a car accident and when I woke up, I fell back to the Joseon Dynasty in Korean history?!"

As an ordinary person in the 21st century, you wake up in Korea, Joseon in 1592 AD, when Japan's invasion.
According to the original history, the Japanese Invasion of Korea in 1592, was a war in which Joseon won, but for some reason, Joseon was destined to collapse at this time.
The reason for this is the death of Yi Sun-sin, the legendary admiral, who saves Joseon in real history.
Now, you should change this fate...

If you designate an attack target, you can attack by swinging the sword in 8 directions or stabbing!
A realistic sword action game. You can block, avoid, and slash!
Let's save Joseon Dynasty and admiral Yi Sun-sin by a sword!


Key features of the game
- Full 3D graphics
- Physical collision of sword when you are fighting
- Input the direction of swinging the sword to attack the target you targeted
- The essential fun of sword fighting, such as seeing and avoiding the enemy's blade and using the sword's range to fight back
